description: My current role! After a year and a half with my role in Lhoopa, I've decided to settle with a work-from-home job. Luckily, I got hired as a Software Engineer in a German IT company named Evelan. To be honest, this is my dream job! Being work-from-home while using latest technologies is a matchmade in heaven. But of course, having this role is also a very big challenge for me. The skill level needed are way higher than before, but I'm all for it! Since this will help me in my future career as a successfull Software Engineer.
